lessons.lessonDescription: Learn the basics of reading musical notes.
lessons.content: Notes are symbols representing musical sounds...

flashcards.question: What is the first note on the treble clef?
How many lines are in a standard musical staff?

lessons.lessonDescription: Understand note durations and time signatures.
lessons.content: Each note has a specific duration...

flashcards.question: How many beats does a quarter note get?

questions.question: What is the note on the first space of the treble clef?
How many beats does a whole note have?

flashcards._comment: I ai generated these questions because I know pretty much nothing about music

answers.1: A diatonic scale with a specific pattern of whole and half steps.
answers.2: A chord that has a root, minor third, and perfect fifth.
answers.3: It means to play very loudly.
